TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi AspLog extends Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log

summary.span: 提供用于将事件和异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器中的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides a property and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象提供了一个简单的入口点, 用于[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]访问的日志记录服务。 `My.Application.Log`The `My.Application.Log` object provides a straightforward entry point from which to access the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]'s logging services. `WriteEntry` 和`WriteException`方法将消息写入应用程序的日志侦听器。The `WriteEntry` and `WriteException` methods write messages to the application's log listeners. 可以通过应用程序的配置文件来配置侦听器。The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file. 有关详细信息，请参见[演练：更改 My. Log 写入信息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)和[处理应用程序日志](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)的位置。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md) and [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md). `My.Application.Log`对象仅适用于客户端应用程序。The `My.Application.Log` object is available only for client applications. 对于 Web 应用程序, `My.Log`请使用。For Web applications, use `My.Log`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 下表列出了涉及`My.Application.Log`对象的任务的示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.Log` object. |功能To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将事件信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器Write event information to the application's log listeners|[如何：编写日志消息How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)| |将异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器Write exception information to the application's log listeners|[如何：日志异常How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| |确定写入`My.Application.Log`信息的位置Determine where `My.Application.Log` writes information|[演练：确定 My.Application.Log 写入信息的位置Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)| ## Examples 本示例将演示如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法来记录跟踪信息。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：写入日志消息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

Log 写入信息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)和[处理应用程序日志](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)的位置。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md) and [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md).

summary.span: 创建一个新的 ，然后将它添加到 集合中。

span.span: Creates a new and adds it to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个新的, 将其名称`FileLog`设置为, 并将其配置为记录严重性级别和更高级别的消息。This method creates a new , sets its name to `FileLog`, and configures it to log messages with severity level and greater. 然后, 新的对象将添加到集合中。The new object is then added to the collection. 如果尚未配置 属性,则调用方法。The calls the method if the property has not been configured. 可以在应用程序的配置文件中配置跟踪源。The trace source can be configured in the application's configuration file.
